title: 325btc
author: 325btc
content: Neeed new boss the kingBut for this we need to overtrhough current rulersBut to change world we needd to collect huge ammount of money.So we can use crypto.The problems what new boss will solve are off course too many people but clearly eliminating people not the solution.What we should do i mean the new world boss or king will do instead of killing people in wars the right way is to tax you after each second child until the child will get 20 years old.What abou t resources?Welll its not problem if we can keep population under control or tax the people who born extra.War: War is not needded we can make law whoever try to invade country will go jail for life Only way is the king who can have militaryThe new king will make good world no mess and everything fair and zero tolerance for violation of human rights or that others harm other humans.You see guys the world new king has the best solutions.So lets start to collect money here for the new king if you like the new ideas We need a lot money so we can collect with crypto we need at least like few bilions of usd so we can start hiring the people in and organise all the goverence.So dont be shy to pay also all the investors will be the SHARE HOLDERS Of the new kingdom its create youll be honoured for your life if you are going to help this kingdom to start.ShallÂ  we create telegram group chat for us to join and start collecting the funds right ?

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: True! That's what the world needs. And that's what the world will get.Until the world gets this KING, it will rally to the world's war-mongering leaders, who are preparing the world to fight the KING.People will think that world leaders are preparing for the KING, when all the world leaders are really doing is preparing to destroy the KING when He comes.Who is the KING? Jesus Christ, of course. Why Jesus? Because through the Holy Spirit He knows what everybody is thinking all the time if He wants. And He has the ability to deal with all the people individually if he wants... individually, all at the same time if He wants. So great is His power.Join with Him and His strength, so that His strength protects you from the world leaders. Join, now, while there still is time.

He controls the physics of the Universe with His mind and Spirit. All the money in the universe can't give anybody anywhere near that kind of control or strength.If you want that kind of strength for yourself, do what the others are doing. Start or join a Christian church, and preach Jesus Christ and Him crucified for your sins.

comments.body: The new king, the ruler is the people.The start is for the real experts/scientist to form alternative to WHO and WEFhttps://youtu.be/XUFabwvqak A Global walk out for world freedom.
